name: AVAudioEnvironmentReverbParameters
desc: A class that encapsulates the parameters that you use to control the reverb of the environment node class.

items.name: var enable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether reverberation is in an enabled state.

items.name: var level: Float
items.desc: Controls the amount of reverb, in decibels.

items.name: var filterParameters: AVAudioUnitEQFilterParameters
items.desc: A filter that the system applies to the output.

items.name: func loadFactoryReverbPreset(AVAudioUnitReverbPreset)
items.desc: Loads one of the reverbs factory presets.
